resources.string: Items 6 and 7 are also very important, but the software cannot determine whether they have been successfully opened \nBe sure to carefully set it up according to the tutorial above
As long as it is fully set up, the software can run stably for a long time \n Even if the phone is turned off and restarted, the accessibility service will automatically reconnect
Nowadays, major mobile phones strictly limit the running of background applications for the sake of so-called smoothness
We can only try our best to take measures to avoid the situation where software is easily killed in the background
Creating a foregroud service notification is a good measure to keep things alive
This notice is to inform the phone that I am important and try not to be recalled in the background
This notification cannot be swiped to clear (can be done on Android version 14+), it can be closed by clicking the close button below
1.You can close it by clicking the close button below, which is also a way to turn off and keep it active
2.You can hide notifications for this software in your phone settings, but it is not recommended to do so
3.If the phone configuration is good enough and other maintenance measures are in place, it is not a big problem not to turn on the front desk service
Novices can directly click the OK button below
Auto clear tip of notification bar:
Auto activate the service upon restart:
After enabling this permission, some phones may need to cancel it before uninstalling, so new users can only enable this permission after %d days!
After enabling this permission, some phones may need to cancel it before uninstalling!
Authorization window failed to open, please manually open it
Lock this software in the recent task list
Please grant floating window permission or enable accessibility service first
Background redirection, reminder functions, etc. require this permission
0 pixel (floating window) keep alive, requires accessibility service or floating window permission

Go to the app settings to check if necessary permissions have been granted successfully. Some phones may also need to additionally enable the "Display pop-up windows while running in the background" permission.
Lock this app in the recent tasks list to prevent it from being cleared with one click
In settings, allow this app to auto-start
Please manually bring up the task list interface
No browser seems to be installed on the device
Notification to ensure stable run of the backend
Reduce the probability of software being killed while running in the background
More interesting software can be found on the official account: 消屏器
微信掃壹掃，或者點擊\"去赞赏\"，在微信頁面右上角菜單中 \"從相冊中選取二維碼\"。
支付寶掃壹掃，或者點擊\"去赞赏\"\n您點滴支持，是我們最大動力
點擊任何地方切換赞赏方式
